name: Gaia Piá
description:
This work is a fruit of my meditation experiences that made me feel the space around me with my spirit. Feel the ground is to feel the planet. Gaia Piá is also the name of one of the greatest reggae bands of Brasil and it means Earth's Man. A roots reggae music that teached me to look for the true of life in nature not in ideas. It was made in 2012 when I went through my spiritual awakening. The original artwork was painted with mixed tecnics on fabric. The painting was gave as a present to a great friend many years ago.
This is the second nft to be minted to in the Buddha Consciousness collection.
